transArray.content: The hotel service is very good, the decoration is beautiful, the room is intelligent and fashionable, the little brother at the front desk even gave me coffee, and self-service check-in is also the first experience, very convenient! I went to see the flag raising in the morning, and it was very close by walking. The location is really good. It takes 2 minutes to walk to the subway station, and 15 minutes to the high-speed rail station! Recommended to everyone!
